Management console navigate to the API

choose addit in logs and tracing expand

choose errors and info logs then choose
save
changes now we've turn on the cloudwatch
logs for troubleshooting the API Gateway
all requests sent to the API will be
logged in CL watch which will let us
review detailed information about the
internal server error let's go through
the possible errors in the log and
discuss how to resolve
them Lambda function permissions the
error inv valid permissions on Lambda
function occurs if API Gateway doesn't
have permission to invoke the Lambda
function to resolve this we can add
Lambda invoke permission to the API
using the API Gateway
console navigate to the API Gateway
console
on the API pen choose the name of your

then choose
edit review the region and name of your

redirected to the API page on

Lambda function name when the Lambda

you can see a policy that allows invoke

added throttling issues you might
receive rate exceeded and for to n too
many request exception errors because of
Lambda function throttling issues if

code for concurrent executions then use

increase the Lambda function's
concurrency limit so that the function
doesn't get
thred navigate to the service Cod his
conso on the navigation pen choose ads
services enter Lambda and choose ads
Lambda enter concurrent executions in

concurrent executions Cho the request
increase at account level button enter
your request the concurrent execution
limit then choose request
incorrect or missing HTTP status code
mapping incorrect or missing HTTP status
code mapping can also result in 500
errors similar to the following
execution fail due to configuration
error output mapping refers to an
invalid method response to resolve this
error make sure that an API method
response exists for the status code
return from the back end and is mapped
correctly navigate to the API Gateway

method on the method exclusion pen

text for the missing HTP St code and

save un handled errors un handled errors
in Lambda could lead to exceptions or
timeout causing internal serve error for

function code issues you can also use

of your

then choose the Lambda function name
